name: 羅元隆
objective:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for students with engineering backgrounds. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to consolidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.
schedule:
第01週/測量、直線運動   Week01 Measurement, Motion in one-dimension
第02週/向量、二維與三維運動   Week02 Vectors, Motion in two and three dimensions
第03週/牛頓定律、動力學   Week03 Newton's laws, Particle dynamics
第04週/做功與能量   Week04 Work and energy
第05週/能量守恆   Week05 Conservation of energy
第06週/質心與線性慣量   Week06 Center of mass, linear momentum
第07週/轉動   Week07 Rotation
第08週/扭矩與角動量   Week08 Torque, Angular momentum
第09週/期中考   Week09 Mid-term Exam
第10週/固體平衡   Week10 Equilibrium of rigid bodies
第11週/振盪   Week11 Oscillation
第12週/重力   Week12 Gravitation
第13週/流體靜力學   Week13 Fluid statics
第14週/流體動力學   Week14 Fluid dynamics
第15週/波學   Week15 Waves, Sound waves
第16週/溫度、熱力學第一定律   Week16 Temperature, The first law of thermodynamics
第17週/熱力學第二定律及氣體方程式   Week17 The second law of thermodynamics, The idea gas
第18週/期末考   Week18 Final Exam
